statements: SELECT * FROM compost_material_sources;
SELECT material_id, material_name FROM compost_material_sources WHERE origin_country='USA';
SELECT material_name, origin_country FROM compost_material_sources WHERE quality_rating > 3;
SELECT * FROM compost_material_sources WHERE material_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT material_name, quality_rating FROM compost_material_sources ORDER BY quality_rating DESC;
SELECT material_name, origin_country FROM compost_material_sources WHERE quality_rating > 3 ORDER BY material_name ASC
SELECT * FROM compost_material_sources WHERE origin_country IN ('USA', 'Canada')
SELECT material_name, quality_rating FROM compost_material_sources WHERE origin_country = 'Italy' AND quality_rating < 5 ORDER BY quality_rating DESC
SELECT * FROM compost_material_sources ORDER BY quality_rating ASC, material_name DESC
SELECT material_name, origin_country, quality_rating FROM compost_material_sources WHERE material_name LIKE 'w%'
SELECT * FROM compost_sources;
SELECT source_name, source_type FROM compost_sources WHERE quality_rating > 3;
SELECT * FROM compost_materials ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT material_name, quantity, source_id FROM compost_materials WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT source_name, origin_location FROM compost_sources WHERE source_type = 'Food Waste';
SELECT * FROM compost_sources WHERE quality_rating > 3;
SELECT source_name, source_type, origin_location FROM compost_sources WHERE source_type = 'Food Waste';
SELECT material_name, quantity, timestamp FROM compost_materials WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT source_name, origin_location FROM compost_sources WHERE quality_rating >= 4 ORDER BY source_name ASC;
SELECT source_name, material_name, timestamp FROM compost_sources JOIN compost_materials ON compost_sources.id = compost_materials.source_id WHERE material_name = 'Vegetable Scraps';
SELECT * FROM compost_sources;
SELECT source_name, origin_location FROM compost_sources WHERE quality_rating > 3;
SELECT category_name, description FROM compost_categories ORDER BY category_name DESC;
SELECT source_name, quality_rating FROM compost_sources WHERE origin_location = 'Farm';
SELECT * FROM compost_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM compost_sources WHERE quality_rating > 3 ORDER BY source_name DESC;
SELECT source_name, origin_location FROM compost_sources WHERE quality_rating < 2;
SELECT c.source_name, cc.category_name, cl.weight FROM compost_sources c JOIN compost_logs cl ON c.id = cl.source_id JOIN compost_categories cc ON cc.id = cl.category_id ORDER BY cl.weight DESC;
SELECT c.source_name, cc.category_name, cl.weight FROM compost_logs cl JOIN compost_categories cc ON cc.id = cl.category_id JOIN compost_sources c ON c.id = cl.source_id WHERE cl.weight >= 50;

SELECT c.source_name, c.origin_location, cc.category_name FROM compost_sources c JOIN compost_logs cl ON c.id = cl.source_id JOIN compost_categories cc ON cc.id = cl.category_id WHERE cl.timestamp > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM compost_sources;
SELECT source_name, location FROM compost_sources ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT * FROM compost_materials WHERE material_type = 'Organic' ORDER BY material_name ASC;
SELECT c.source_name, m.material_name, q.quality_rating FROM compost_sources c INNER JOIN compost_materials m ON c.id = m.source_id INNER JOIN compost_quality q ON m.material_id = q.material_id;
SELECT a.analysis_type, a.result, q.test_date FROM compost_analyses a INNER JOIN compost_quality q ON a.quality_id = q.quality_id WHERE a.result <> 'Pass';
SELECT * FROM compost_sources WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT source_name, contact_person FROM compost_sources WHERE id = 3;
SELECT material_name, material_type FROM compost_materials WHERE source_id IN (SELECT id FROM compost_sources WHERE location = 'California');
SELECT q.quality_rating, q.test_date, a.analysis_type, a.result FROM compost_quality q JOIN compost_analyses a ON q.quality_id = a.quality_id WHERE q.material_id = 1;
SELECT cqm.material_name, cqm.material_type, cq.quality_rating FROM compost_materials cqm JOIN compost_quality cq ON cqm.material_id = cq.material_id WHERE cqm.source_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM compost_sources;
SELECT source_name, location, material_type FROM compost_sources WHERE quality_rating > 3;
SELECT transaction_id, source_id, type_id, quantity, transaction_date FROM material_transactions ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT producer_name, location, production_capacity FROM material_producers WHERE production_capacity > 1000 ORDER BY producer_name ASC;
SELECT m.type_name, s.source_name, sm.quantity FROM material_types m JOIN source_materials sm ON m.type_id = sm.type_id JOIN compost_sources s ON sm.source_id = s.source_id;
SELECT * FROM compost_sources ORDER BY location, quality_rating DESC LIMIT 10

SELECT source_name, material_type, quantity FROM compost_sources JOIN source_materials ON compost_sources.source_id = source_materials.source_id WHERE material_type='Organic' AND quantity > 100 ORDER BY quantity DESC
SELECT producer_name, production_capacity, location FROM material_producers ORDER BY producer_name ASC

SELECT source_name, type_name, quantity, transaction_date FROM compost_sources JOIN material_transactions ON compost_sources.source_id = material_transactions.source_id JOIN material_types ON material_transactions.type_id = material_types.type_id WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT source_name, contact_person, material_type FROM compost_sources WHERE material_type IS NOT NULL AND quality_rating >= 3 ORDER BY source_name
